channel.title: Any1 need a type macro?
channel.description:
well this is some instructions to get a typer that u have 2 press 1 button for!.. dont flame.. if u dont want just click back.
1. go on google
2. type in "my function keys"
3. click tiop link
4. scroll down untill you see the picture of two floppy discs. saying site 1 and site 2. click on site 2.
5. open it up and click f1. type your txt and press ok. log in on rs and everytime you press f1 it will appear.
6. you can do upto 4 texts. f1,f2,f3,f4,
well hmm.. i hope this helps :)

item.title: Any1 need a type macro?
item.dc:creator: @fr33_2_pk fr33 2 pk
item.description:
@fr33_2_pk wrote:

well this is some instructions to get a typer that u have 2 press 1 button for!.. dont flame… if u dont want just click back.

  1. go on google

  2. type in “my function keys”

  3. click tiop link

  4. scroll down untill you see the picture of two floppy discs. saying site 1 and site 2. click on site 2.

  5. open it up and click f1. type your txt and press ok. log in on rs and everytime you press f1 it will appear.

  6. you can do upto 4 texts.
    f1,f2,f3,f4,

well hmm… i hope this helps
